title: Ticket #718: Mixed GCB usage on a single family of daemons crashes/hangs?
description:
Observed, but not deeply investigated: Start up Condor with GCB on. Change the configuration file to turn it off (NET_REMAP_ENABLE=FALSE). Restart a single daemon, say, "condor_restart -schedd machinename". Observe either the schedd crashing, or hanging.

I expect to see a similar problem is I use SCHEDD.NET_REMAP_ENABLE=FALSE in the first place.

While mixing GCBized and non-GBCized daemons may be an unsupported configuration, it should not crash nor hang.
